sense.gloss: the world is a scene of constant changes, the blue sea turns into a mulberry field
the world is a scene of constant changes (as a mulberry field changing into a blue sea)
hair that has lost its shine due to ageing

k_ele.e: 桑田変じて滄海となる
桑田変じて滄海と成る

r_ele.r: そうでんへんじてそうかいとなる

sense.gloss: the world is a scene of constant changes, a mulberry field changes into a blue sea
drop in the bucket, drop in the ocean, one grain of millet in a vast ocean
talented person unbeknownst to the world
